desc: Students develop and complete individual projects in fiction, deepening and polishing their work. Class sessions are devoted to discussion of craft, examination of literary models, and workshopping of student writing. Prerequisite: Completion of English 293 or permission of instructor.
name: Adv Fict Wrtg Wkshp
notes: Prerequisite: Completion of English 293 or permission of the instructor.
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Completion of English 293 or permission of instructor.
title: Advanced Fiction Writing Workshop
